full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGO NAS SBYANG CHOG BYA BA'I TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM GYI RIM GROR LA BRTEN NAS SBYANG CHOG BYA BA'I TSUL 'DI NI RANG NYID DRAN PA GSO BA DANG, DON GNYER CAN GZHAN MANG POS KYANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS @018B ^DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG ,)
